metadata.title: CVE-2019-10648 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Robocode through 1.9.3.5 allows remote attackers to cause external service interaction (DNS), as demonstrated by a query for a unique subdomain name within an attacker-controlled DNS zone, because of a .openStream call within java.net.URL.

criterions.comment: robocode package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.3.3-2').
